data.text: Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Narɨ kru muŋɨnɨŋɨndu vana ŋgata ŋgatɨŋgɨruta ndaŋɨnɨŋ ñamba ŋɨnɨŋ vata maŋambamara. Kamavɨtɨra narɨŋ Got sɨhwɨmaña musa andɨrɨmandɨ.
7.2: Mk 4.24Narɨ kru muŋɨnɨŋ ŋgatɨŋgɨrundara maña, Got ndahara narɨŋ ŋgatɨŋgurɨmandɨ. Kamata nurɨŋ muhɨmɨmuhɨm musa andara maña, narɨŋ ndahara kɨmbɨ andɨrɨmandɨ.
7.3: Lu 6.41-42Mumɨndɨhi nasindu tamɨŋga hañɨ ayɨwɨrsɨ sukɨyɨpu ha ŋgata ambandana. Hara nandɨ tamɨŋga hañɨ ahusɨŋga aru haŋandɨhinɨrɨm maŋindarɨndana.
Nandɨ tamɨŋga hañɨ ahusɨŋga ha kɨtihɨti, mumɨrɨm yasi nandɨ tamɨŋga hañɨ ayɨwɨrsɨ ha tɨhuyɨkɨrɨtɨnɨ vamba ambɨrɨmana.
Na kuyusɨhɨrɨmbɨhapɨha mɨŋga. Atɨ ahusɨŋga nandɨ tamɨŋgañɨ ha wɨsa mɨŋata kavara. Kamata tɨhɨramaŋgarata sɨhinda nasindu tamɨŋga hañɨ ayɨwɨrɨsɨyɨpu kɨyɨmandɨ haŋandɨhin ŋgamaŋgarata tɨhuyɨkɨra.

7.6: Mt 10.14Muhɨmɨmuhɨm Gotɨrɨm yɨhɨramandu haŋɨnɨŋ mɨŋgata upɨriŋ maŋgumara. Narɨŋ aŋga kimɨruramata sɨtumandɨhi. Naŋga narɨŋandɨ mɨnza avivi haŋɨnɨŋ sambarɨm maŋgavaramara. Kamatɨranda tandayɨ taya taŋgumɨŋgutumandɨhi, vami.

Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Got naŋga kuyundavarata nuŋ kitɨwɨtɨra narɨŋ muhɨmɨmuhɨm ŋgurɨmandɨ. Kamata muhɨmɨmuhɨm puhɨravuhɨraramata ŋgɨmandɨra. Kamata tavɨ kɨndɨŋari yɨvuyɨvuramɨtɨra narɨŋambirɨm Got kɨndɨŋari pɨhɨrɨmandɨ.

7.8: Snd 8.17 naŋga, Jer 29.12-13 naŋga, Lu 11.10 naŋga, Je 1.5 naŋga, 1 Jo 3.22-23 naŋga, 5.14-15Harɨm kru Gotɨŋ kitɨhundu haŋɨnɨŋ muhɨmɨmuhɨm mɨŋandu. Kamata muhɨmɨmuhɨmɨrɨm puhɨravuhɨraramandu haŋɨnɨŋ ŋgandu. Naŋga tavɨ kɨndɨŋari yɨvuyɨvuramandu haŋɨnɨŋɨrɨm Got kɨndɨŋariha pɨhɨrɨndi.
7.9: Lu 11.11Kɨra nɨñɨndu muvat mɨŋgandu ñɨŋi, nɨŋuvaŋ mavatɨmbarɨm kitɨwɨti nɨŋuva nuŋ tɨmba ŋguhi vaha. Manɨŋganzɨkwɨ.
Naŋga nuŋandɨ ñɨŋi nɨŋuvaŋ asarɨm kitɨwɨti tau ŋguhi vaha. Manɨŋganzɨkwɨ.

7.11: Lu 11.13 naŋga, Je 1.17Nɨŋuvanin narɨ ñamba vana sambɨ andara. Hara narɨŋandɨ ñɨŋisɨmɨŋ avihɨmɨŋgɨm ŋgurɨm mavɨndamandara. Kamataharɨm ŋgamara. Narɨŋandɨ Nava nuŋandɨ pɨhuyɨ kɨyɨ hama naŋga kuyundavarɨtɨra, muhɨmɨmuhɨm avihɨmɨŋgɨm ŋgurɨm kɨnzɨhɨnzɨtɨrɨmandɨ.

7.12: Mt 22.39-40 naŋga, Lu 6.31 naŋga, Ro 13.8-10 naŋga, Ga 5.14 naŋga, 1 Ti 1.5Muhɨmɨmuhɨm vana narɨŋ kru muŋɨnɨŋ andɨmu vata pɨrɨ tamɨrɨmandɨra ha, sɨhwɨmaña musa kru muŋɨnɨŋ ndahara andɨmara. Kanɨmata vana nɨŋandɨhin Gotɨndu tɨkatɨka kuyundu kuyu sapa. Naŋga kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara haŋɨnɨŋɨndu kuyuyɨndu kuyu sapa, vami.
Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Narɨ kwɨmbɨsiki suksɨmbɨrɨ hañɨ umara. Pɨhu yɨwarayɨwara hañɨ uhuhundu kwɨmbɨ ha aru. Naŋga pɨhu kandɨhañɨ uhuhu kwɨmbɨ ha patɨ. Harɨm krunavundi sambɨ kwɨmbɨ kandɨhañɨ undu.

Hara pɨhu sɨhaŋgɨyɨhɨyɨndu kwɨmbɨsiki haŋandɨhin sukɨsɨmbɨrɨ sɨkwɨ. Naŋga kwɨmbɨsiki kandɨhañɨ uhuhurɨm avɨrɨ tamahana. Kamataharɨm krunavundi mɨŋgɨyavatɨvat taya kwɨmbɨsiki kandɨha ŋgata kandɨhañɨ undu, vami.

Jisas sɨhinda nɨmavami, Kru muvɨra kuyusɨhɨrata ara kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara ŋɨnɨŋ vamba ambɨrɨmandɨyu. Harɨm tamɨŋga naŋga kɨndamara. Nurɨ kuyusɨhɨranzɨra narɨŋ kuyu avivi ambavarɨmandɨyu. Hara narɨŋandɨ indarɨmit hambu mɨŋawɨnɨkwɨnɨtɨrɨm andɨrɨmandɨyu. Kandɨhamata haŋɨnɨŋ upɨri saŋara maña sipsip vɨsa tarɨŋguramata arɨñɨ uta sipsip mu mɨŋahandɨmɨndaŋ vata andɨndu.

7.16: Mt 7.20 naŋga, 12.33 naŋga, Lu 6.43-44 naŋga, Ga 5.19-22 naŋga, Je 3.12Nurɨ andɨrɨmandɨyu musa ha ŋgata ambɨrɨmandɨra. Nurɨ kuyusɨhɨrata ara kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara ŋɨnɨŋ vamba ambandu, vamba ambɨrɨmandɨra. Kru wain kɨrɨs mɨŋɨrɨm siki punzɨ naŋgañɨ uta mamɨŋandu, naŋga kru ahu fik kɨrɨs mɨŋɨrɨm tɨpa sɨhɨvɨ naŋgañɨ uta mamɨŋandu.
7.17: Jer 11.19Kamata maña sɨhanaŋga ahu avivi haŋɨnɨŋ kandɨ avivi tamandu. Ahu ñamba haŋɨnɨŋ kandɨ ñamba tamandu.
7.18: Lu 6.43Ahu avi haŋɨnɨŋ kandɨ ñamba mandamandu. Ahu ñamba haŋɨnɨŋ kandɨ avi mandamandu.
7.19: Mt 3.10 naŋga, Lu 3.9 naŋga, Jo 15.2 naŋga, 15.6Sɨhanaŋga ahu kandɨ avi mandamandu haŋɨnɨŋ tahɨravarandu. Kamata ahumirayɨ kavarahu tumbɨrundu.
7.20: Mt 12.33Kamataharɨm nurɨ andɨrɨmandɨyu vana hambu taya ŋgata ambɨrɨmandɨra. Nurɨ kuyusɨhɨrata ara kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara ŋɨnɨŋ vamba ambandu, vamba ambɨrɨmandɨra.

7.21: Hos 8.2 naŋga, Mt 21.31 naŋga, Lu 6.46 naŋga, Sɨ 19.13 naŋga, Ro 2.13 naŋga, Je 1.22 naŋga, 1.25Krunavundi sambɨ saŋɨnaŋga yaŋ ambandu, Aru mɨŋga, Aru mɨŋga, vamba ambandu. Hara krunavundi kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋ Gotɨndu tɨwɨyɨ maŋgɨyɨmandɨyu. Kru Yavandak nuŋandɨ pɨhuyɨ kɨyɨ hamandu kuyu taya mɨŋahandɨrɨmandɨ hama, Yavandakɨndu tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨmandɨ.

7.22: 1 Ko 13.2Got kuyu mɨŋasɨrɨvɨrɨmandɨ hɨvɨ hañɨ, krunavundi sambɨ yambirɨm nɨmavamba ambɨrɨmandɨyu. Aru mɨŋga nandɨ ñɨmbiyɨ ara Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavarandarɨŋ. Naŋga nandɨ ñɨmbiyɨ taya ara sundɨ ñamba pɨŋguvarata muhɨmɨmuhɨm nzihɨ sihɨrandarɨŋ, vamba ambɨrɨmandɨyu.

7.23: Sng 6.8 naŋga, Mt 10.33 naŋga, 13.41-42 naŋga, 25.12 naŋga, 25.41 naŋga, Lu 13.25-27 naŋga, 2 Ti 2.19Kamavɨtu kandɨhɨvɨ hañɨ nurɨŋ yi kuyu kɨmbañɨ ambɨrɨman. Yi narɨŋ maŋgahandandin. Narɨ ñamba vana andɨndara. Harɨm yi kɨn nɨñɨ mikitamamara, vamba ambɨrɨman, vami.
Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Kru yandɨ kuyu indarɨta mɨŋahandandi hama, kru indarɨmit avi naŋga mɨŋga nuŋandɨ tavɨ tɨmba hɨmbañɨ tɨhundi maña mɨŋga.

Kumba kayɨvata mɨŋguta tɨmba parapara aru ha ŋgandi. Kamata tɨmba hɨmba hañɨ tavɨ tɨpɨ haŋɨnɨŋ tararamandi. Kamataharɨm, kuku mɨŋgata kukuwɨrɨ taŋgundi, naŋga wɨnɨ tɨkatɨka pandi. Kamata mɨŋañaŋgɨrahi ndahara tavɨ kandɨha mamɨŋgata yɨvundi.
Hara kru yandɨ kuyu indarɨta mamɨŋahandandi hama, kru indarɨmit avi manɨman mɨŋga nuŋandɨ tavɨ kasɨyɨ tɨhundi maña mɨŋga.
Kamatɨhi wɨnɨ pandi. Naŋga kuku mɨŋgandi. Kamata kukuwɨrɨ taŋguta tavɨ ha mɨŋañaŋgɨrahi sɨkwɨtaya mɨŋgata yɨvundi, vami.

7.28-29: Mk 1.22 naŋga, Lu 4.32 naŋga, Jo 7.46Jisas kandɨ kuyu nɨŋɨnɨŋ, tɨkatɨka kuyundu mirɨmba naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ kuyu ŋgundu maña maŋgumi. Manɨŋga. Nurɨŋ kru ñɨmbi naŋga hama kuyu ŋgumañandɨmi. Kamatɨhi krunavundiŋ mavɨyahavarami.
